title: Braun Series 7 shaver - Patented ActiveLift™
description:
Watch the video to find out about the  Braun Series 7, the shaver that automatically reads your face and adjusts the power of its 10,000 micro-vibrations to the density of your beard thanks to the revolutionary intelligent Sonic Technology. 

Braun Series 7 also gives you even more motor power where you need it most for thorough and comfortable shave.

asset.title: Braun Series 7 shaver - Patented ActiveLift™
asset.description:
Watch the video to find out about the  Braun Series 7, the shaver that automatically reads your face and adjusts the power of its 10,000 micro-vibrations to the density of your beard thanks to the revolutionary intelligent Sonic Technology. 

Braun Series 7 also gives you even more motor power where you need it most for thorough and comfortable shave. 

Find out more here: http://braun.com/global/male-grooming/series-shavers/series-7.html
asset.author: Braun

transcripts: Braun's patented ActiveLift especially engineered for problem areas. Unique oscillating middle trimmer with 130 movements per second. Lifts and cuts flat-lying hairs fro a thorough shave in problem areas. Braun Series 7.
